You reach out and place your hands on the black orb, concentrating deeply as you do so. You feel your mind escaping from your body, flowing into the black orb. Like stepping out of a portal, you find yourself in the center of the temple of the Seekers in Haven. You hear one of the fanatics go on and on about how one of their chalices has disappeared. Your vision becomes blurry, and you return to your body with a jerk, instinctively removing your hands from the orb.
